frequency.label: How often are you paid by %s?

errors.required: Select how often you are paid

netPay.label: How much do you get paid each time by %s?
netPay.hint: This is the exact amount that is paid into your bank account.

errors.required: Enter how much you get paid
errors.notNum: Amount you get paid must only include numbers
errors.badFormat: Enter the amount in the right format, like 125 or 125.50
